lyrics:
23 contributorstranslationspolskiportuguêsitalianodeutschin between lyricsverse 1 mike shinoda
let me apologize to begin with
let me apologize for what im about to say
but tryin to be genuine was harder than it seemed
and somehow i got caught up in between

verse 2 mike shinoda
let me apologize to begin with
let me apologize for what im about to say
but tryin to be someone else was harder than it seemed
and somehow i got caught up in between

chorus mike shinoda  chester bennington
between my pride and my promise
between my lies and how the truth gets in the way
the things i wanna say to you get lost before they come
the only thing thats worse than one is none

verse 3 mike shinoda  chester bennington
let me apologize to begin with
let me apologize for what im about to say
but tryin to regain your trust was harder than it seemed
and somehow i got caught up in between

chorus mike shinoda  chester bennington
between my pride and my promise
between my lies and how the truth gets in the way
the things i wanna say to you get lost before they come
the only thing thats worse than one is none
the only thing thats worse than one is none
you might also likebridge mike shinoda  chester bennington
and i cannot explain to you
in anything i say or do or plan
fear is not afraid of you
but guilts a language you can understand
i cannot explain to you in anything i say or do
i hope the actions speak the words they can

chorus mike shinoda  chester bennington mike shinoda
for my pride and my promise
for my lies and how the truth gets in the way
the things i wanna say to you get lost before they come
the only thing thats worse than one is…
pride and my promise
between my lies and how the truth gets in the way
